title: FAQ
content: よくある質問 # Bocchiのソースコードを公開する計画はありますか？ # はい

title: 利用許諾
content:

title: プライバシーポリシー
content:
Privacy Policy # Your data belongs to you.
Currently, the app doesn’t declare INTERNET permission.
In the near future, the app may send activity data to improve the app. When we do, we will clearly specify the information being sent and its purpose, update our privacy policy, and seek your consent again. We will also provide an option to stop the transmission of this information.
